title: 820-2850 vertical red lines when it uses intregrated GPU
message: MacBook Pro 15 820-2850 vertical red lines when it uses intregrated GPU, dedicated gpu works perfectly. What could be the cause? is more probably mux or failing intel gpu?

title: 820-2850 vertical red lines when it uses intregrated GPU
message: Reflow the MUX, make sure to 1000% remove the bonding glue around and under the chip or you will be pulling and reballing it.
